66 // HISTORY:
67 //
68 // -Oct 30, 2005
69 // A CIccTagCreator singleton class has been added to provide general
70 // support for dynamically creating tag classes using a tag signature.
71 // Prototype and private tag type support can be added to the system
72 // by pushing additional IIccTagFactory based objects to the
73 // singleton CIccTagCreator object.
74 //
76 
77 #ifndef _ICCTAGFACTORY_H
78 #define _ICCTAGFACTORY_H
79 
80 #include "IccDefs.h"
81 #include <memory>
82 #include <list>
83 #include <string>
84 
85 //CIccTag factory support
86 #ifdef USESAMPLEICCNAMESPACE
87 namespace sampleICC {
88 #endif
89 
90 class CIccTag;
91 
101 class IIccTagFactory
102 {
103 public:
104  virtual ~IIccTagFactory() {}
105 
117  virtual CIccTag* CreateTag(icTagTypeSignature tagTypeSig)=0;
118 
129  virtual const icChar* GetTagSigName(icTagSignature tagSig)=0;
130 
141  virtual const icChar* GetTagTypeSigName(icTagTypeSignature tagTypeSig)=0;
142 };
143 
144 
145 //A CIccTagFactoryList is used by CIccTagCreator to keep track of tag
146 //creation factories
147 typedef std::list<IIccTagFactory*> CIccTagFactoryList;
148 
149

161 public:
172  virtual CIccTag* CreateTag(icTagTypeSignature tagSig);
173 
185  virtual const icChar* GetTagSigName(icTagSignature tagSig);
186 
198  virtual const icChar* GetTagTypeSigName(icTagTypeSignature tagTypeSig);
199 };

201 class CIccTagCreator;
202 
203 typedef std::auto_ptr<CIccTagCreator> CIccTagCreatorPtr;
204 
214 class CIccTagCreator
215 {
216 public:
217  ~CIccTagCreator();
218 
230  static CIccTag* CreateTag(icTagTypeSignature tagTypeSig)
231  { return CIccTagCreator::GetInstance()->DoCreateTag(tagTypeSig); }
232 
243  static const icChar* GetTagSigName(icTagSignature tagTypeSig)
244  { return CIccTagCreator::GetInstance()->DoGetTagSigName(tagTypeSig); }
245 
246 
257  static const icChar* GetTagTypeSigName(icTagTypeSignature tagTypeSig)
258  { return CIccTagCreator::GetInstance()->DoGetTagTypeSigName(tagTypeSig); }
259 
271  static void PushFactory(IIccTagFactory *pFactory)
272  { CIccTagCreator::GetInstance()->CIccTagCreator::DoPushFactory(pFactory); }
273 
287  static IIccTagFactory* PopFactory()
288  { return CIccTagCreator::GetInstance()->DoPopFactory(); }
289 
290 private:
292  CIccTagCreator() { }
293 
305  static CIccTagCreator* GetInstance();
306 
307  CIccTag* DoCreateTag(icTagTypeSignature tagTypeSig);
308  const icChar *DoGetTagSigName(icTagSignature tagSig);
309  const icChar *DoGetTagTypeSigName(icTagTypeSignature tagTypeSig);
310  void DoPushFactory(IIccTagFactory *pFactory);
311  IIccTagFactory* DoPopFactory(bool bAll=false);
312 
313  static CIccTagCreatorPtr theTagCreator;
314 
315  CIccTagFactoryList factoryStack;
316 };
